relation: Accepts a visit from the specified visitor. (Overrides TSqlFragment.Accept(TSqlFragmentVisitor).)
Accepts a visit for the Children from the specified visitor. (Overrides TSqlStatement.AcceptChildren(TSqlFragmentVisitor).)
textBeforeTable: Methods Top Gets the fragment start offset value. (Inherited from TSqlFragment.) StartOffset Gets the starting line. (Inherited from TSqlFragment.)
